articles.title: Greetings to Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guinean President
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Alpha Conde, president of the Republic of Guinea, on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of independence of Guinea. 
					 Kim Yong Nam expressed the belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition would grow stronger. 
					
					 He sincerely wished the Guinean president and people bigger successes in their work for social and economic development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Delegation of Russian Youth League
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Delegation of Russian Youth League
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Talks between FMs of DPRK and Russia Held
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Russia Held 
 Moscow, October 1 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong who is on a visit to Russia and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov on Wednesday. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Ri Su Yong and his party, the DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of his embassy and from the Russian side relevant officials of the Foreign Ministry of Russia. 
					
					 Both sides discussed the issues for boosting the friendly relations between the two countries and some international issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East who is chairman of the Inter-Governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade and Economy, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia, on the same day.

articles.title: NDC Urges Park Geun Hye to Face up to Reality
articles.content:
NDC Urges Park Geun Hye to Face up to Reality
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Thursday in connection with the fact that Park Geun Hye again let loose vitriolic language against the DPRK:
					 Park who earned an ill fame as top class confrontational manic and modern day traitor by calling for the "north's dismantlement of nuclear program" and the solution of the "human rights issue in the north" at the UN, again pulled up the DPRK at a "state council meeting" on September 30.
					
					 She said "human rights issue" in the north is the "major aim of unification" pursued by the south Korean authorities, revealing that "unification" touted by them is to bring down the social system in the north in the end.
					
					 Seized by the ambition for confrontation with fellow countrymen, she said that "no passive approach should be taken in fear of the north's backlash". She even cried out for passing the "North Korean Human Rights Act", which was not adopted for the past decade, at the puppet National Assembly session.
					
					 The racket over the "north's nuclear program" and "human rights in the north" kicked up by Park Geun Hye is no more than a struggle of a mentally deranged woman thrown into despair and a desperate bid of a criminal facing her miserable end.
					
					 Park seems to think that it is wisest to support her master's rhetoric about the "human rights in the north" in order to prolong her remaining days even by clinging to the dirty coattail of the U.S.
					
					 She is resorting to the racket of "human rights in the north" in a bid to bury into oblivion the horrible human rights situation in south Korea.
					
					 She should seriously think why the "North Korean Human Rights Act" is rejected by south Koreans including the political circle.
					
					 If she has even a bit of normal thinking faculty, she should face the harsh denunciation of the nation and keep her mouth shut even though she may not take necessary measures.
					
					  She was raised in Chongwadae watching her father taking to flunkeyism and submitting to big powers. After his father's tragic death she led an isolated life, away from ordinary people. So, she might know about "human rights" in the society where the rich gets ever richer and the poor ever poorer but she can never understand the genuine human rights in genuine society centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Park is seriously mistaken if she thinks she can distort the truth and defy the just mindset of the people by making such coarse invectives.
					
					 Her ugly stream of invectives that she will settle the "human rights issue in the north" through "cooperation with the international community" is little short of an open declaration of her intention never to give up the ambition for "unification through absorption".
					
					 Park should clearly face up to the reality, not forgetting even a moment that her short tongue can put her long neck at stake.

articles.title: CPRK Statement Denounces Park Geun Hye for Resorting to Acts of Sycophantic Treachery
articles.content:
CPRK Statement Denounces Park Geun Hye for Resorting to Acts of Sycophantic Treachery
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued a statement Thursday on the occasion of the 7th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration. In the statement the committee denounced the south Korean puppet forces for seriously violating the north-south joint declarations and pushing the north-south ties into the worst catastrophe.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Obsessed by the anachronistic wild ambition for "unification through absorption", the Park Geun Hye group totally denied all the agreements reached between the north and the south and escalated confrontation with the fellow countrymen. Recently it groundlessly took issue with the nuclear program and "human rights issue" in the north at the UN, making a blatant challenge to the dignity and social system in the DPRK and glaringly revealing its despicable confrontational nature.
					
					 Acts of defying north-south declarations reflecting the unanimous will of the nation can never be pardoned and they are bound to face the most shameful ruin.
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as the starting point and a cornerstone for the development of the north-south ties.
					
					 The Park regime speaks out in public that it does not deny the north-south declarations but, in fact, it has totally denied and wantonly violated the declarations by peddling confrontational scenarios such as "confidence-building process" and "Dresden declaration".
					
					 The implementation of the October 4 declaration will naturally lead to the solution of such issues as "cooperation" and "building of groundwork" much touted by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 However, they have persistently denied and turned their faces away from the implementation of the north-south declarations because they have pursued "unification through absorption".
					
					  The south Korean authorities should clearly understand that the more desperately they undermine the foundation for the improvement of relations and make a mess of all the achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification and persist in the hotchpotch "north policy", the more clearly they will reveal their true colors as confrontation maniacs.
					
					 Park should mind that as the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" put up by traitor Lee Myung Bak was branded as confrontational policy, her hideous "north policy" can also meet a miserable end, being rejected by the nation.
					
					 Act of sycophantic treachery encroaching upon the fundamental requirements and interests of the nation will meet stern punishment by the nation.
					
					 To move to settle the reunification issue by relying on outsiders is the most shameful act of sycophantic treachery today when the scramble over the Korean peninsula is getting fierce day by day.
					
					  Park begged the U.S. to give support so that south Korea can make "preparations for unification", playing the coquette with the U.S. and took the unrealistic issue of "world peace park" even to the UN, asking for help. She is really wretched pro-U.S. stooge and traitor to the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are not able to discuss the internal issue of the nation which should be solved with the north unless they get an approval of the U.S. and they can do nothing in the north-south relations without instructions of their master. Such a sycophantic attitude of submitting to the U.S. can not be found in any other part of the world.
					
					 The reckless joint military exercises with the U.S. which offer the Korean peninsula to serve the interests of outsiders must be put to an end at an early date.
					
					 An end should also be put to such despicable act of kowtowing to outsiders and soliciting them to escalate confrontation with the north.  
					
					 The DPRK will deal the heaviest blow to anyone who resorts to heinous hostile act of slandering its dignity and social system.
					
					 The puppet group's hostile acts of doing harm to the fellow countrymen and stirring up confrontation have gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon those who dare defame its dignity and social system, no matter who or where they might be, but deal the most merciless sledge-hammer blows to them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not just pay lip-service to "dialogue" but immediately stop their own anti-DPRK reckless acts first and make the riff-raff stop such hostile acts as doing harm to and slandering the compatriots in the north.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities continue taking the road of confrontation to challenge the aspiration of all Koreans for reunification as now, they will never be able to escape a miserable fate like traitor Lee Myung Bak who was cursed and punished by the nation for his vicious confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Youth League
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Youth League 
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation. 
					 The gift was conveyed on Thursday to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league who is heading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Wooden Vase, Horsehair Shoes, Gifts to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Wooden Vase, Horsehair Shoes, Gifts to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are a wooden vase and horsehair shoes, which were presented to leader Kim Jong Il by Norodom Sihanouk, who was the great king of Cambodia, and his son Norodom Yuvaneath.
					 Deeply fascinated by Kim Jong Il's personality during several rounds of their visits to the DPRK, they presented the gifts to him on his birthday, February 16, Juche 63 (1974).
					
					 The wooden vase gives a glimpse of the national character of the Cambodian people, with various types of blue and black patterns carved in it against the background of light brown color. 
					
					 The horsehair shoes are made of black horse's mane and tail for the summer use.
					
					 The gifts, appended with the king's card reading "Your Excellency Kim Jong Il, I pay respect to you", represent their deep reverence for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, and other foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Thursday. 
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in humble reverence.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state they paid homage to them.
					
					 They looked round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and
					
					Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Institute led by Vice-Director Kim Ul Ho came back home Thursday after visiting Mongolia.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Wins Gold Medal at Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Wins Gold Medal at Asian Games
						
 Inchon, October 1 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The DPRK women's football team demonstrated the national dignity and honor at the 17th Asian Games.
					 It played the finals with its Japanese rival on Oct. 1.
					
					 At around 12th minute of the match Kim Yun Mi scored the first goal in a confused fight.
					
					 Captain Ra Un Sim succeeded in scoring another goal at around 52nd minute.
					
					 3 minutes later the DPRK team lost one goal.
					
					 But at around 87th minute Yun Song Mi made a long pass to Ho Un Byol who smartly headed it into the rival's goalmouth to score the third goal.
					
					 The DPRK team trounced its Japanese rival 3:1 to come first in the women's football at the 17th Asian Games.

articles.title: DPRK People Jubilant with Victory in Women's Football Finals at Asiad
articles.content:
DPRK People Jubilant with Victory in Women's Football Finals at Asiad
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Women's football finals of the 17th Asian Games was broadcast on the Korean Central TV from 00:00 Thursday.
					 The DPRK's 3:1 victory over Japan has pushed the people across the country into ecstasy of joy.
					
					 An Song Rim, a resident living in Rakwon-dong, Pothonggang District of Pyongyang, told KCNA that he wanted to offer congratulatory bouquets to those women footballers at once.
					
					 In rush hour, Pyongyang citizens looked joyful over the DPRK's victory in the women's football finals.
					
					 Kang Myong Chan, a student of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 I was sure of the DPRK's victory in the match, because its team includes such football aces as Kim Yun Mi, Ra Un Sim and Ho Un Byol.
					
					 I have no doubt that the men footballers, too, will win the finals.

articles.title: Families in DPRK Offer Felicitations to Footballers at Asiad
articles.content:
Families in DPRK Offer Felicitations to Footballers at Asiad
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK are greatly delighted at the news that its women's football team beat its Japanese rival in the finals at the 17th Asian Games.
					 The gold medal match was televised at 00:00 on Thursday.
					
					In this regard, KCNA had interviews with families of footballers taking part in the 17th Asian Games.
					
					 Ho Yong Hae, father of Ho Un Byol, a footballer of the April 25 Sports Team, said:
					
					 When my daughter scored third goal in the second half, I was extremely excited.
					
					 I want to offer felicitations to my daughter who presented victory in the game to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jang Yong Sil, mother of the team's captain Ra Un Sim, said:
					
					 All my family members shouted for great joy when my daughter scored a goal in the finals.
					
					 Tears rolled down my face when I saw on TV my daughter stand on podium with the national flag raised. I am eager to embrace my daughter and all other footballers who won the game to display the honor of Songun Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, families of men footballers have expressed belief that their team, too, would win in the finals at the Asiad.
					
					 So Jong Hyok, younger brother of So Kyong Jin who is a football player of the Sobaeksu Sports Team, said:
					
					 While seeing on TV the women footballers on podium, I pictured in mind my elder brother standing on the same podium. I hope that the men's football team would win in the finals by displaying great strength and courage.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Seized with Joy
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Seized with Joy 
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The news of the DPRK's victory in the women's football finals at the 17th Asian Games has lashed the whole country into ecstasy of joy.
					 The DPRK defeated the one-time World Cup champion Japan 3:1 in the finals.
					
					 Watching the gold medal games on TV, many people burst into joyful tears when the match came to an end.
					
					 Newspapers of the country highlighted the finals, and the news has become a main topic of its citizens.
					
					 O Kwang Hyok, head of a workshop of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, told KCNA he was sure that the DPRK would soon win the world championship in the women's football.
					
					 So Sung Hyok, an art teacher of Kinjae Junior Secondary School in Sosong District of Pyongyang, said that he would make a masterly picture with images of the women footballers painted in it.
					
					 Jong Hyon Chol, a teacher of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, said that those women footballers are very praiseworthy.
					
					 The local people are now earnestly waiting for the day to meet the admirable women footballers.

articles.title: DPRK Woman Boxer Bags Gold Medal at Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Woman Boxer Bags Gold Medal at Asian Games
 Inchon, October 1 (KCNA Correspondent) -- DPRK player Jang Un Hui won a gold medal in the 75kg category of women's boxing events at the Asian Games.
					 In preliminaries she knocked down her Uzbekistani rival in 1 minute and 45 seconds at the first round and trounced her Kazak rival 3:0 in the semi-finals. 
					
					 She beat her Chinese rival 2:1 in the finals.
					
					 DPRK players won silver and bronze medals in various other events.
					
					 On Tuesday Kim Un Hyang and Song Nam Hyang won silver medal at women's pair 10 meter platform diving while Yun Won Chol took a silver medal at men's 59 kg category of Greco-Roman wrestling.
					
					 Women table tennis players came third in team events. Choe Un Gyong and Kim Jin Ok grabbed a bronze medal in women's pair 3 meter springboard diving and Ri Hak Won a bronze medal at men's  66 kg category of Greco-Roman wrestling.

articles.title: Cambodian Embassy Officials Help Paeksok Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Cambodian Embassy Officials Help Paeksok Co-op Farm
 Sinchon, October 2 (KCNA) -- Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Op Sisawada and staff members of his embassy here Thursday helped the farmers of the Korea-Cambodia Friendship Paeksok Co-op Farm in Sinchon County of South Hwanghae Province. 
					 They heard the explanation about the monument to the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung to the farm before giving help-hands to the farmers harvesting rice.
					
					 At the break the guests conversed with farmers there. 
					
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Workshop on Discrete Math and Computational Geometry Given in DPRK
articles.content:
Workshop on Discrete Math and Computational Geometry Given in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A workshop on discrete mathematics and computational geometry took place at the e-library of Kim Il Sung University here from Sept. 29 to Oct. 2 in attendance of teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					 The workshop, given by Prof. Stephan Langerman of Universite Libre de Bruxelles of Belgium and Prof. Janos Pach of Lausanne Engineering University in Switzerland, dealt with latest successes made in discrete mathematics, the orientation of its development and some problems arising in application of computational geometry.
					
					 Expressing satisfaction over the successful workshop, Janos Pach hoped that international academic exchange with DPRK scholars would get more brisk.

articles.title: 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest in DPRK
articles.content:
2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The 2014 provincial mass sports contest opened here on Wednesday.
					 Some 1 400 contestants from 12 provinces and municipalities will compete in 14 events, which include 25m pistol by officials and clerks, roller-skating by primary school pupils and swinging by women.
					
					 At Kim Il Sung Stadium, there will be women's football matches of secondary school students, hurdle race of workers, peasants and clerks and field and track events of sports teams.
					
					 The football matches are to be played by 12 teams, divided into four groups. Top four teams from group league will compete in semi-finals and finals.
					
					 At the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, there will be men's volleyball matches, tug of war, ssirum (Korean wrestling) and amusement games. Women's basketball matches will take place at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street and team pattern and sparring matches of Taekwon-Do at the Taekwon-Do Hall.
					
					 In the football matches, held after the contest opening ceremony, South Hamgyong Province beat Rason Municipality 2:0 and Pyongyang City defeated Kangwon Province 3:0.

articles.title: It Is Wild Dream for U.S. to Maintain Its Position as World's "Only Superpower": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
It Is Wild Dream for U.S. to Maintain Its Position as World's "Only Superpower": Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- There is information that the U.S. forces have rounded off a new strategy for mounting a prompt strike, a plan capable of striking any target on the globe within an hour. It is reported that the strategy targets not only China but also Korea, Iran, etc.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says the danger and reckless nature of this strategy lie in that the military strategy has been rounded off as more offensive one in line with the concept that the greatest defense is a surprise preemptive strike.
					
					 Referring to the reason why the U.S. has been keen on developing the latest weapons after setting forth the strategy, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the U.S. has been keen on propping up its sinking position as the "only superpower" in a bid to realize its ambition for world domination at any cost.
					
					 The power of threat and domination by ultramodern nuclear weapons and U.S. dollars, two symbols showcasing the U.S. strength, has rapidly weakened. Several big powers are calling for addressing not only world economy but sensitive issues concerning peace and security by concerted efforts, not by U.S. high-handedness.
					
					 The reality proves that the U.S. is falling into decline and its position as the "only superpower" is rapidly sinking.
					
					 The frantic military moves of the U.S. to prop up its position as the "only superpower" are a reckless act and a revelation of megalomania of those who are unaware of where they stand.
					
					 The U.S. had better clearly know that its attempt to maintain the position as the world's "only superpower" is a foolish dream.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Leaflet-scattering Operation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Leaflet-scattering Operation
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' leaflet-scattering operation is an intentional provocation to escalate tension between the north and the south and a revelation of the design to ignite a war against the north, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article.
					 Through the leaflet-scattering operation the south Korean puppet forces seek to justify their policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen by escalating the tension and shift the responsibility for the bedeviled north-south relations, escalating military tension and the mounting danger of war on to the north, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities continue to scatter anti-DPRK leaflets after putting the military on alert to cope with the possible retaliation from the north. This proves that they are well aware of the fact that the leaflet-scattering acts can lead to a military conflict. 
					
					 Nevertheless, they continue the leaflet-scattering operation, a dangerous act that can be committed only by those who already made resolves to fight a war against the north. 
					
					 Lurking behind the leaflet-scattering racket is a criminal scheme to spark a conflict between the north and the south and ignite a war against the north together with the U.S.
					
					 Intolerable are the moves of the south Korean puppet group escalating confrontation and tension between the north and the south and increasing the danger of war to meet their sinister purpose.

articles.title: Fascist Action Inciting Confrontation with Compatriots Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fascist Action Inciting Confrontation with Compatriots Denounced in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The puppet supreme court sentenced to imprisonment Han Chung Mok, co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress on Sept. 29, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The court charged that he spearheaded the anti-U.S. rally which demanded the abrogation of the alliance with the U.S. and withdrawal of the U.S. forces at the "instructions of the north".
					
					 It sentenced Han Chung Mok and other members of the Solidarity to prison terms.
					
					 The puppet group is getting hell-bent on the confrontation with compatriots while deliberately linking the south Korean people's anti-U.S. struggle and reunification movement with the north.

articles.title: Introduction of U.S.-made Fighters Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Introduction of U.S.-made Fighters Opposed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a rally for peace and disarmament in front of the puppet Defense Ministry building Tuesday, in which it opposed the introduction of the U.S.-made F-35 fighters.
					 A letter of protest was read out at the rally.
					
					 It noted that the agreement for the purchase of fighters is nearing its conclusion.
					
					 It held that the Defense Ministry moves to buy the fighters under the pretext of having capacity to deter the north but it would bring a war crisis to the Korean Peninsula and waste the taxes paid by the people only as the fighters are to be used for preemptive attacks from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. itself admits the shortcomings of the fighters, it added.
					
					 It stressed that the humiliating introduction of the fighters should be stopped immediately as it only fattens the U.S. munitions enterprises at the sacrifice of the south Korean people.
					
					 The letter urged the defense minister to take the responsibility for mocking at people and immediately step down.
					
					 That day the organization staged a demo against the introduction of the fighters.

articles.title: S. Korean Political Camp Denounced for Sidestepping Issue of Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Political Camp Denounced for Sidestepping Issue of Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims of the Ferry Sewol Disaster of Tanwon High School of south Korea held a press conference at the joint incense-burning altar in Ansan of Kyonggi Province on Sept. 30, according to the south Korean MBC. 
					 The organization said the ruling and opposition parties settled the negotiation on institution of a special law on the ferry Sewol disaster and made public an agreement that day. 
					
					 The organization branded the measure as an act of sidestepping the issue of probing the truth about the disaster and seeking political interests. 
					
					 It clarified that the bereaved families openly deny the unjust agreement.

articles.title: Liaison Society for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Japan
articles.content:
Liaison Society for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Tokai Liaison Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism was inaugurated in Aichi Prefecture, Japan on Sept. 23.
					 Toshikazu Suzuki, chairperson of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected adviser of the liaison society.
					
					 At the inaugural meeting the members of the liaison society expressed their resolution to render positive efforts for the Japan-DPRK friendship movement including the application of the tuition-waiver program to Korean schools, correct understanding of history and normalization of Japan-DPRK diplomatic relations in the spirit of peace and friendship, expressing their pleasure over the inauguration of the liaison society. 
					
					 Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, congratulated the inauguration of the liaison society, adding:
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism represents the integral whole of the revolutionary idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and enriched by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There is growing interest among the world people in Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism which was formulated by First Secretary Kim Jong Un, and the number of those willing to learn after his warm affection for the people is on increase.
					
					 The preparations for founding the study groups of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism are brisk across Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on Sept. 26.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The work also elucidates the tasks to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: Celebrations Held in Benin, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Celebrations Held in Benin, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Benin and Bangladesh on Sept. 24 and 25 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK. They included a meeting, photo exhibition and film shows by the Socialist Party of Benin and the Bangladesh Group for the Study of Songun Policy.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Monument to Party Founding" and "Pyongyang at Night."
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Benin party, said in his speech:
					
					 One of the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il is that he developed the WPK into an ideologically pure and transparent entity and a party which achieved firm unity and cohesion.
					
					 He made sure that the WPK held the Juche idea as an invariable guiding idea after the demise of Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, and formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 Regarding it as the important requirement for party building and activities to boost unity and cohesion of the party, he built the WPK into the genuine mother party serving the people.
					
					 The vice-president of the Benin party noted that the immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed in building the party will shine forever along with the triumphant WPK.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that the 69-year long history of the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung is the glorious one in which it turned the DPRK into the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and led the human cause of independence to a shining victory.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Benin.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente guineo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente guineo 
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Guinea, Alpha Conde, con motivo del 56o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises con larga historia y tradicion se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en sus trabajos para el desarrollo socioeconomico y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Rusia
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Rusia
Moscu, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia primero las conversaciones entre el canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, de visita en Rusia, y el homologo de la Federacion Rusa, Serguei Lavrov.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana la comitiva del canciller, el embajador y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana en Rusia y, por la rusa, los funcionarios del MINREX.
					
					Fueron debatidos los problemas que se presentan para ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros asuntos internacionales de interes mutuo.
					
					 or otra parte, el mismo dia Ri Su Yong se reunio con el ministro de Desarrollo de Lejano Oriente de Rusia, Alexandr Galushka, presidente de la parte rusa del Comite Inter.-Gubernamental para Cooperacion en Comercio, Economia, Ciencia y Tecnica entre la RPDC y Rusia.

articles.title: Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN advierte a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN advierte a Park Geun-hye
						
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye volvio a soltar palabras virulentas, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 2 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					Hace poco, en la palestra internacional Park Geun-hye gano la mala fama como maniaca de enfrentamiento y traidora vendepatria moderna por haber insistido en la "renuncia nuclear del Norte de Corea" y criticado su "situacion de DDHH". Y el 30 de septiembre pasado, en el "Consejo de Ministros" volvio a calumniar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En particular, Park dijo publicamente que el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC es la "meta principal de unificacion" que persiguen las autoridades surcoreanas. De esta manera, no oculto que la "unificacion" de que hablan ellas mismas significa "derrocar" el regimen norcoreano. 
					
					Park Geun-hye, enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida, insistio con nerviosismo en hacer todo lo posible por aprobar en la Asamblea Nacional la "ley de DDHH del Norte", no hecho durante un decenio, diciendo que "no se debe actuar de modo inactivo temiendo la reaccion del Norte". 
					
					Consideramos la insistencia de Park en la "renuncia nuclear" y su alboroto de "DDHH" anti-RPDC como ultimos esfuerzos de un psicopata y de un delincuente a punto de morir. 
					
					Park Geun-hye piensa en que sumarse a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de su amo norteamericano es la mejor medida para mantener su vida restante. 
					
					La campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Park es una artimana astuta para dejar en oculto la tragica situacion de DDHH del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Park debe reflexionar con gravedad por que la "ley de DDHH del Norte" fue rechazada tanto no solo por la poblacion surcoreana sino tambien por el circulo politico. 
					
					Si ella tiene buenas entranas, aunque fueran poco, y es bien educada, debera aceptar sin decir nada las criticas agudas que reflejan la voluntad de toda la nacion, y no hablar mas. 
					
					Ella crecio en su infancia en Chongwadae viendo a su padre acostumbrado al servilismo a grandes potencias y al avasallamiento, y despues de la muerte de su padre, vivio aislada al margen de la sociedad humana. Pues, podria saber los "derechos humanos" de la sociedad donde los ricos se hacen mas ricos y los pobres, mas pobres, pero, no podra entender jamas los verdaderos derechos humanos de la autentica sociedad humano-centrica.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion si ella piensa en que con las maldiciones podria inducir en error la verdad y la justa opinion publica 
					
					Las palabras virulentas de Park de resolver el "problema de DDHH del Norte" en "colaboracion con la sociedad internacional" significan la declaracion abierta de no abandonar nunca la ambicion de la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion". 
					
					Park debe ver correctamente la realidad sin olvidar ni un momento que podria ser degollada por su mala lengua.

articles.title: CRPP condena a la camarilla de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP condena a la camarilla de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 7o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 2 una declaracion denunciando a los titeres surcoreanos que llevan a la extremada fase catastrofica las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas infringiendo gravemente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur. 
					La camarilla de Park Geun-hye, embriagada por la ilusion anacronica de "unificacion mediante la absorbicion", persigue la confrontacion fratricida negando totalmente todos los acuerdos aprobados entre ambas partes coreanas, revela la nota y continua:
					
					Recientemente, desafio frontalmente a la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando injustamente en la ONU las armas nucleares y la "situacion de DDHH" de la parte connacional. De esta manera, puso al desnudo su asquerosa naturaleza conflictiva. 
					
					La negacion a las declaraciones Norte-Sur, que reflejan la voluntad de toda la nacion, es un proceder nunca intolerable que no podra evadir el arruinamiento mas vergonzoso. 
					
					La historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre son puntos de partida y piedras de toque para la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					El "poder" surcoreano de Park Geun-hye dice tanto que no niega las declaraciones Norte-Sur, pero de hecho, los niega totalmente y los infringe insistiendo en los guiones de enfrentamiento tales como "proceso de confianza" y "declaracion de Dresden". 
					
					En el caso de ejecutar la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, se resolveran naturalmente los temas presentados por las autoridades surcoreanas como la "cooperacion" y la "preparacion de base". 
					
					Sin embargo, niegan y dan espaldas a la ejecucion de las declaraciones Norte-Sur porque persiguen la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion". 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que cuanto mas destruyan la base y los exitos de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas adquiridos en la era del 15 de Junio por ambas partes coreanas y persistan en la miscelanea "politica sobre el Norte", se hara mas evidente su naturaleza como maniacas de enfrentamiento. 
					
					La camarilla de Park Geun-hye debe reflexionarse sobre el fin tragico de su "politica sobre el Norte" como la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 000 dolares", presentadas por el traidor Lee Myung Bak, fueron calificados de politica de confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Los actos vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias que violan las demandas e intereses fundamentales de la nacion seran sentenciados severamente por la nacion. 
					
					En la actualidad, en que se hacen mas agudas las pugnas hegemonicas en torno a la Peninsula Coreana, resolver el problema de reunificacion bajo el amparo de las fuerzas extranjeras resulta el acto vendepatria mas vergonzoso que deja el destino de la nacion como victima de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye, horda de lacayos pronorteamericanos y vendepatrias, mendigo a EE.UU. animarla para "hacer preparativos de unificacion" y solicito hasta en la ONU acondicionar el "parque mundial de paz". 
					
					Es mas vergonzosa la actitud proyanqui de las autoridades surcoreanas que no pueden discutir sin ganar el consentimiento de EE.UU. los asuntos internos de la nacion a ser resueltos por ambas partes coreanas ni pueden hacer nada en las relaciones intercoreanas antes de obtener el mando del amo norteamericano. 
					
					Hay que acabar cuanto antes con los imprudentes ejercicios militares conjuntos con EE.UU. contra la RPDC que pueden ofrendar la Peninsula Coreana como victima de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Deben dejar de solicitar a las fuerzas extranjeras el enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Daremos el castigo mas despiadado a los que cometen brutales actos hostiles calumniando la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC. 
					
					Llegan a la etapa intolerable los actos hostiles de los titeres surcoreanos que insultan a la parte connacional e inculcan el enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					No perdonaremos a los que insulten la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC, aunque esten en cualquier rincon del orbe, y les daremos el castigo mas duro. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben hablar de "dialogo", sino poner fin a actos hostiles contra sus connacionales e impedir la campana anti-RPDC de las escorias humanas de toda indole. 
					
					Si las autoridades se entregan como ahora al enfrentamiento en desafio a la aspiracion a la reunificacion de toda la nacion, no podran eludir el destino tragico del traidor Lee Myung Bak que fue repudiado y sentenciado por la nacion por haber recurrido al enfrentamiento fratricida durante todo su mandato.

articles.title: Futbolistas de RPDC ganan victoria final en XVII Juegos Asiaticos
articles.content:
Futbolistas de RPDC ganan victoria final en XVII Juegos Asiaticos
						
Inchon, 1 de octubre (corresponsal de ACNC) -- La seleccion de futbol femenino de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea exalto la dignidad y el honor de la nacion en la competencia de futbol femenino de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					Tuvo lugar el dia primero la final de futbol entre los equipos de la RPDC y Japon.
					
					A los minutos 12, el numero 12 Kim Yun Mi marco el primer gol y a los minutos 52, el 10 Ra Un Sim, jefa del equipo, el segundo.
					
					A eso de los minutos 55, el equipo japones marco un gol.
					
					A los minutos 87, el numero 3 Ho Un Byol marco el tercer con cabezazo.
					
					Asi, el equipo ocupo el primer lugar en la competencia de futbol femenino de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos tras vencer a su rival japones por 3:1.

articles.title: Boxeadora de RPDC gana medalla de oro
articles.content:
Boxeadora de RPDC gana medalla de oro 
Inchon, 1 de octubre (corresponsal de ACNC) -- La boxeadora de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jang Un Hui, gano la medalla de oro en la division de 75 kg de boxeo femenino, efectuada el dia primero.
					En la eliminatoria y en la semifinal, Jang doblego a sus rivales de Uzbekistan y Kazajstan, respectivamente y  en la final  vencio por 2:1 a la china.
					
					Por otra parte, Kim Un Hyang y Song Nam Hyang ocuparon segundo lugar en el salto al agua en el trampolin fijo de 10 m de altura y Yun Won Chol, ocupo el mismo lugar en la division de 59kg de estilo grecorromano.
					
					Tambien, las jugadoras de tenis de mesa ocuparon el tercer lugar en la competencia colectiva.
					
					Choe Un Gyong y Kim Jin Ok, en el salto al agua en la tabla elastica de 3 m de altura y Ri Hak Won en la competencia de 66 kg del estilo grecorromano ocuparon tambien el tercer lugar, respectivamente.
